event.title: French wine tasting with Tapas in Daikanyama, Shibuya: Only 2980yen
event.catch: Enjoy French wines Together with Tapas for 2980yen!
event.description:
Coming all the way from the Languedoc, a French wine representative will introduce his wine estate while serving delicious Tapas.

You will drink about 5 kinds of wine:
Viognier
Sauvignon blanc
Merlot
Cabernet Rose
Chardonnay

Places are limited therefore advance reservations are required
Price: 2980yen
Payment in advance by Paypal, Credit Card or bank transfer please
